amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the marketing of non-ambulatory livestock, or so-called downed animals, at intermediate markets and requires sick animals to be humanely euthanized.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in the Congressional Record to add a new section regarding unlawful stockyard practices involving nonambulatory livestock.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ackerman amendment (A039) Agreed to by voice vote.
